duties_responsibilities.duty: Aggressively grow sales and promote the Aerofoam USA brand within the HVAC segments.
Independently manage existing customers and prospecting activity in the designated territory.
Participate in sales and marketing meetings, as well as trade shows, to showcase Aerofoam product offerings.
Utilize proficient computer skills to process and review orders and report market intelligence.
Travel and be on the road for 85% of the time, located in South Carolina, Georgia, Tennessee, or North Carolina.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 5 years of successful outside sales experience in HVAC parts.
